dn18:4.2: kho panāpi → tena kho panāpi (sya-all); te kho panapi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn18:7.2: aṭṭhiṃ katvā → aṭṭhikatvā (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | sabbaṃ cetasā → sabbaṃ cetaso (bj, sya-all, km); sabbacetaso (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn18:10.5: manussarājā bhavituṃ pahomi → so ito cuto manussesu rājā bhavituṃ pahomi (sya-all, km); amanussarājā divi homi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn18:12.2: dibbaparisā → dibbā parisā (pts-vp-pli1ed) | samantato nisinnā honti → sannisinnā honti (bj); sannisinnā honti sannipatitā (mr)
dn18:20.1: pallaṅkena → paccekapallaṅkesu paccekapallaṅkena (si, mr), paccekapallaṅke (sya-all, km)
